text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Magazine Articles
Magazine Articles
Interviewer

"The Straylight live event,
which ended amidst loud cheers."

"Thinking about the next stage,
expectations inevitably rise──"

Oh～! Fuyuko-chan, look～
we’re being praised so much～♪
I see......that’s good.

Huh......?
Fuyuko-chan, you don’t seem too happy?
It’s not that I’m not happy......

As a fan, I will continue to follow all of you!
The best unit, Straylight’s success!

If it’s that interviewer, I only think that of course
it’s going to be an article full of praise.

I see～, I’m like yay～ We were praised twice,
in the interview and in the article!
Hey, what do you think, Producer～?

......Well, I’m honestly happy that everyone is being praised.
I can’t deny a bit of favoritism though......

But, the reason the interviewer became a fan
is because of everyone’s hard work.
Well, that might be true.

Ahaha～♪
We’ll have to work hard again～!

Aah......
We’re out of snacks......

Oh, by the way, talking about this
just reminded me of something.
? Ah, what is it?

The interviewer
said something──
